welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ieper, Belgium! Known for its rich history and charming atmosphere, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's beauty and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Merville/Calonne Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ostend/Bruges International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ostend/Bruges International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
